Date.description: Date of the app discovery and engagement report

App Apple Identifier.description: Unique identifier for the app in the App Store

Event.description: Type of event (Impression, Tap, Page view, etc.)

Page Type.description: Type of page where the event occurred

Page Title.description: Title of the page where the event occurred

Source Type.description: Source of the app discovery (App Store search, App Store browse, etc.)

Source Info.description: Additional information about the discovery source

Campaign.description: Marketing campaign associated with the engagement

Engagement Type.description: Type of engagement (Update, Open, Get, etc.)

processed_date.description: Date when the record was processed
